mapper.insert: insert into sf_shop ( id, create_time, name, user_id, status, logo, explanation, shout_num, pageviews, sale_amount, ship_amount, qr_code, remark, version ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{explanation,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, #{shoutNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pageviews,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update:
update sf_shop
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
explanation = #{explanation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shout_num = #{shoutNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pageviews = #{pageviews,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sale_amount = #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ship_amount = #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, name, user_id, status, logo, explanation, shout_num, pageviews, sale_amount, ship_amount, qr_code, remark, version from sf_shop where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_time, name, user_id, status, logo, explanation, shout_num, pageviews, sale_amount, ship_amount, qr_code, remark, version from sf_shop
select id, create_time, name, user_id, status, logo, explanation, shout_num, pageviews, sale_amount, ship_amount, qr_code, remark, version from sf_shop where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, create_time, name, user_id, status, logo, explanation, shout_num, pageviews, sale_amount, ship_amount, qr_code, remark, version from sf_shop where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update sf_shop
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
explanation = #{explanation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shout_num = #{shoutNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pageviews = #{pageviews,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sale_amount = #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ship_amount = #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = version + 1
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}
